extendedInfo.description: iHeartAuto is a free version of the iHeartRadio digital radio app specifically designed for use in your car, truck or SUV.The iHeartAuto radio app for Android offers free music in an all-in-one, free internet radio service. Stream your favorite live radio stations or create commercial-free Custom Stations featuring songs from the artist you select and similar music.Simply connect the iHeartAuto app to your Ford SYNC AppLink, Pioneer AppRadio, Kenwood GPS Navigation Systems or Android Car Dock to get started.--------THE BEST OF LIVE INTERNET RADIOListen to more than 1,500 of your favorite live radio stations from coast-to-coast including pop, country, hip-hop and R&B, rock, talk, news, sports, and more. Browse radio stations by music style and location, then hit the scan button to move from radio station to radio station within a format.CREATE YOUR OWN STATIONSSimply pick a song or artist to create your own commercial-free Custom Station featuring free music from that artist and similar ones. Choose from our catalog of over 15 million songs and 400,000 artists. Use iHeartRadio's exclusive Discovery Tuner to control how much variety you want in your music.ANYTIME, ANYWHERE, ALWAYS FREETake your favorite radio stations and Android music wherever you go. Log in to iHeartRadio for free through email or Facebook to make iHeartRadio uniquely yours. Create, save, and share your internet radio stations from wherever you access iHeartRadio.--------For the full list of supported car stereos and docks, please visit http://help.iheartradio.com and select "Automotive." For the standard iHeartRadio app, search for "iHeartRadio" in the Google Play.***Love iHeartRadio for Auto? Please give us a 5-star Google Play rating and review! Have a suggestion, question or concern? Please email us at help@iheartradio.com and we'll be happy to assist you.***

reviews.title: Good app for Galaxy S4 Pioneer
reviews.comment: I enjoy this on my pioneer 8500. Always connect with no issue. Easy interface while driving. Commercial free music is the best....
reviews.author: Woody P

reviews.title: Galaxy s4
reviews.comment: Iheart is the best hands down. Now we sync to our car screen without bleeding our phones battery to view the songs being played.
reviews.author: Larry Watson

reviews.title: Won\'t save password and constantly making me login.
reviews.comment: The app would be good, but it won\'t save my password and constantly makes me login. VERY annoying when I\'m in my car and I want to go, and impossible to use if driving (would be like texting and driving having to type in your email and password). When that happens, I just touch the Pandora or Tunein app and off it plays without issues. Please fix this huge flaw.
reviews.author: Rusty Zimmerman

reviews.title: 3000 miles away
reviews.comment: Im still @ Home . Good stuff, Island sounds on the road !
reviews.author: O.G. Hawai\'i

reviews.title: Iheart is great, iheart auto sucks
reviews.comment: Developers please Go download Pandora radio, try it out with ford sync,  make iheart radio work like Pandora radio. You don\'t have to have a separate Pandora and auto version like with Iheart the same app has all functionality built into one.  Also when I tell it to play one of my stations it does unlike iheart auto. The stations are much better on iheart though so Fix this stuff then I\'ll give you a 5 star rating!
reviews.author: Josh Boyd

reviews.comment: Sweet

reviews.title: The Update Killed Iheart
reviews.comment: I was able to use this awesome app without having any of the supported devices. I liked the radio stations I had created and now nothing works. Oh well
reviews.author: Daniel Malave

reviews.title: Seems to lock screen orientation
reviews.comment: Only seems to work in Landscape mode.  Also seems to lock my display so that it doesn\'t rotate.  Was listening with Waze running but Iheart was in landscape and wouldn\'t rotate while Waze was in portrait and wouldn\'t rotate either with the phone.  Home screen was stuck in landscape as well. Droid Razr Maxx ICS.
reviews.author: Terry Sculac

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Outstanding app. I sure wish it would remember my login though. I have to type in my id and pw far too often.

reviews.title: Really Buggy
reviews.comment: I use this with an android car dock and my first issue with this app is that there is no way to exit the app after i get it started.  There are no settings available to me and no options button available.  The audio to Bluetooth is not reliable either.  So for not so good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: CAN\'T GO WRONG WHEN YOU ARE THE DJ
reviews.comment: A GREAT WIDE SELECTION OF SONGS.  LOVE IT GIVE IT A TRY AND YOU TOO WILL BECOME A DJ

reviews.title: Doesn\'t connect on I heart setting
